result.execSummary:
The defendant Arthur S Siewert was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to provide a DNA Sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

No Appearance by Defendant.  Defendant has made payment arrangements.  Court orders Warrant - stay pending compliance with Payment Plan Agreement.
Payment Plan Agreement/Letter of Understanding
FTP Hearing 10-19-2015 for $592.00

ADDRESS INFO for Arthur S Siewert

Prior: 139 E Union St, Berlin, WI 54923
Reminder Notice sent to Defendant has been returned.  Return to Sender.  Re-sent to: 219 Mound St, Berlin WI 54923
Payment Plan Agreement/Letter of Understanding

10:16 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - will accept offer.  ADA recites agreement - upon plea to charge with no enhancer will recommend a fine and costs.  Defendant concurs.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty.  Court strikes the domestic enhancer.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  ADA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by ADA.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:  $150 fine plus costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.  DNA Sample.  Court goes over expungement of the DNA sample.

Court adjourned at 10:21 a.m.
Status hearing at 06-02-2015 10:00 am

10:07 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant, missed appointment with the DA/s office.  Court will set for status hearing on June 2, 2015 at 10:00 a.m.

Court adjourned at 10:08 a.m.
Status hearing at 05-18-2015 10:00 am

1:30 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - will not be getting an attorney, does not qualify for PD representation and can't afford one at this time.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court sets for status hearing on MAy 18, 2015 at 10:00 a.m.  Defendant to make an appointment with the DA's office.

Court adjourned at 1:32 p.m.
Status hearing at 05-04-2015 01:00 pm
Status hearing at 05-04-2015 02:00 pm
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.

2:50 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present via video from the Green lake County Jail with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Atty Privat enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  Court will set for Status Hearing on May 4, 2015 at 2:00 p.m.

Court adjourned at 2:51 p.m.
